---
title: "Document Term Matrix"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(lsa)
library(corpus)
library(tm)
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
#TASA SMALL FILE
TASA_short<-readLines("TASA/TASA/tasaDocsPara - Sample.txt")
length(TASA_short)
docs<-Corpus(VectorSource(TASA_short))
tdm<-TermDocumentMatrix(docs)
tdm<-as.matrix(tdm)
tdm
#dtm<-t(tdm)
#dtm


doc_1<-Corpus(VectorSource(TASA_short[1]))

tdm<-TermDocumentMatrix(doc_1)
tdm<-as.matrix(tdm)
tdm

#eigenvector

#eigenvalue
```
